title: "Yes Lender Buys Edge Funder For AI-Based SMB Loans"
excerpt: "Yes Lender says its new acquisition has given it an “edge” in funding small businesses. The alternative finance company announced Tuesday it had acquired the FinTech startup Edge Funder. The company says the deal gives Yes Lender’s customers access to Edge Funder’s direct-to-merchant portal and strengthens Yes Lender’s position in the merchant cash advance sector,"
